Maximum number of tasks that can be run in parallel when running other Compi pipelines.
Name of the params file for the GenomeFastScreen pipeline [pegi3s/pss-genome-fs] (relative to the working directory).

Name of the params file for the IPSSA pipeline [pegi3s/ipssa] (relative to the working directory).

tasks.task:
rm -rf ${working_dir}/check_cds/3_renamed_seqs_mappings_inverted mkdir -p ${working_dir}/check_cds/3_renamed_seqs_mappings_inverted
for file in $(ls -A ${working_dir}/check_cds/1_files_to_re_run_renamed_back/); do cat ${working_dir}/fast-screen/renamed_seqs_mappings/${file} | awk -F'\t' '{print $2 "\t" $1}'> ${working_dir}/check_cds/3_renamed_seqs_mappings_inverted/${file} done
rm -rf ${working_dir}/check_cds/4_files_to_re_run_fixed_renamed mkdir -p ${working_dir}/check_cds/4_files_to_re_run_fixed_renamed

mv ${working_dir}/files_to_re_run ${working_dir}/files_to_re_run_prev mkdir ${working_dir}/files_to_re_run
# Copy files having at least 3 sequences (i.e. at least six lines, as the check-cds produces files without line breaks) for file in (ls -A ${working_dir}/check_cds/4_files_to_re_run_fixed_renamed/); do COUNT=$(cat ${file} | wc -l) if [ ${COUNT} -ge 6 ]; then cp ${working_dir}/check_cds/4_files_to_re_run_fixed_renamed/${file} ${working_dir}/files_to_re_run/${file} fi done
